name: Pork Chops with Stewed Tomatoes
author: Lisa
summary: Very easy, tender pork chops baked with onions, mushrooms and stewed tomatoes. This is a GREAT hit with my family and the chops will melt in the mouth!!
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, with juice
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cut the onion into thick slices and arrange them on the bottom of a casserole dish
Lay the pork chops over the onions
Season the chops with salt and pepper to taste
Cover the chops with the mushrooms and pour the stewed tomatoes over all
Bake, covered, at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour
Remove cover and bake for 30 more minutes
